title: Kramers-Wannier dualities for WZW theories and minimal models

title_detail.value: Kramers-Wannier dualities for WZW theories and minimal models

summary:
We study Kramers-Wannier dualities for Wess-Zumino-Witten theories and
(super-)minimal models in the Cardy case, i.e. the case with bulk partition
function given by charge conjugation. Using the TFT approach to full rational
conformal field theories, we classify those dualities that preserve all chiral
symmetries. Dualities turn out to exist for small levels only.

summary_detail.value:
We study Kramers-Wannier dualities for Wess-Zumino-Witten theories and
(super-)minimal models in the Cardy case, i.e. the case with bulk partition
function given by charge conjugation. Using the TFT approach to full rational
conformal field theories, we classify those dualities that preserve all chiral
symmetries. Dualities turn out to exist for small levels only.

author: Efrossini Tsouchnika
fulltext:

Hamburger Beiträge zur Mathematik Nr. 276

and minimal models

Abstra t
We study Kramers-Wannier dualities for Wess-Zumino-Witten theories and (super-)minimal models in the Cardy ase, i.e. the ase with
bulk partition fun tion given by harge onjugation. Using the TFT
approa h to full rational onformal eld theories, we lassify those dualities that preserve all hiral symmetries. Dualities turn out to exist
for small levels only.
